removals.reasoning: Outer parentheses around the cast are redundant. The cast syntax requires parentheses around the type but not an extra pair around the whole cast expression.
Outer parentheses around the cast are redundant; (double*)A is sufficient.
Outer parentheses around the cast are redundant; (double*)B is sufficient.
Outer parentheses around the cast are redundant in a function argument; (double*)C is equivalent and clearer.
Outer parentheses around the cast are redundant in a function argument.
Outer parentheses around the cast are redundant in a function argument.
Outer parentheses around the cast are redundant in the call to print_array.
The outermost parentheses around the cast chain are redundant; keep the cast syntax but remove the extra pair.
The outermost parentheses around the cast chain are redundant.
The outermost parentheses around the cast chain are redundant.
Parentheses around the array index expression are unnecessary; removing them improves readability without changing precedence.
Parentheses around the array index expression are redundant and can be removed.
Parentheses around the array index expression are redundant.
The outer parentheses around the multiplication are redundant and the inner index parentheses are unnecessary; removing them preserves precedence and improves clarity.

removals.expression: dot = (dot + ((alpha * A[(i * nk + k)]) * B[(k * nj + j)]));
removals.replacement: dot = dot + alpha * A[i * nk + k] * B[k * nj + j];
removals.reasoning: The outer parentheses are redundant. Multiplications are associative here, so parentheses around the sub-products and the array-index parentheses are unnecessary; removing them keeps the same semantics and simplifies the expression.
Parentheses around the array index are unnecessary.
Inner parentheses around (num + factor) are redundant. Keep a single pair around the whole numerator to preserve the intended grouping before division.
Parentheses around this simple constant division are unnecessary.
The outer parentheses are redundant and the inner parentheses around the operand of the cast are unnecessary; use the common form (uint8_t*)&grid_copy.
Remove redundant outer parentheses and the unnecessary parentheses around the cast operand.
Outer parentheses redundant; simplify the cast expression.
Outer parentheses redundant; inner operand parentheses unnecessary.
Remove redundant outer parentheses and the unnecessary operand parentheses in the cast.
Same as above: redundant outer parentheses and unnecessary operand parentheses.
Outer parentheses redundant; simplify the cast expression.
Outer parentheses redundant and unnecessary operand parentheses can be removed.
Parentheses around a single variable used as an argument are unnecessary.
Parentheses around the array index are redundant.
